column5: Didn't want to put this in my Quinte thread. Finally got it uploaded......Bill, my friend stayed over - and the day after my fishing trip nailed this 15.5 Brute.Man, what a fish. Congrats Bill!http://i964.photobucket.com/albums/a...QuinteDec4.jpgbobby
Monster. Nice. How long was that hog?

Thats a good question Greg........duh......... I forgot to ask him. I'll get it from him and post up.ps: My wife and I absolutely loved SDakota - spent some time in the state in August - I really took to the rivers and creeks - she took to WALL City like a dog on a bone..............lol,bobby
Glad you had a good time. Wall drug - free ice water. Lol
...........not to mention the 2000 signs along the freeway offering free coffee Greg..........lol
